doc.title: Paranoia
doc.plot: High tech, inner-active Game Show in which nine real people, playing "live" via satellite from venues all across America, compete against a single in-studio contestant for up to 1 million dollars. Viewers at home can actually play along on the Internet or telephone - all taking money away from the beleaguered in-studio contestant. Paranoia is hosted by Peter Tomarken and airs "live" thrice weekly.
